checkDeclarationFiles.description: Check declaration files for type errors.

failFast.description: Stop running tests after the first failed assertion.

fixtureFileMatch.description: The list of glob patterns matching the fixture files.

quiet.description: Silence all test runner output except errors and warnings.

rejectAnyType.description: Reject the 'any' type passed as an argument to the 'expect()' function or a matcher.

rejectNeverType.description: Reject the 'never' type passed as an argument to the 'expect()' function or a matcher.

reporters.description: The list of reporters to use.

rootPath.description: The path to a directory containing files of a test project.

target.description: The range of TypeScript versions to test against.

testFileMatch.description: The list of glob patterns matching the test files.

tsconfig.description: The look up strategy to be used to find the TSConfig file.
